package.name: xbot_msgs
package.description:
XBot message definitions for OpenMower.
Contains message types for: - Absolute pose (GPS, sensor fusion) - Action information - Map overlay visualization - Map size - Robot state - Sensor data (double and string values) - Sensor information/metadata - Wheel tick encoders
And services for: - Action registration
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
